attributes.action: Resign immeadiatly and ellect Chris Morris prime minister with a cabinet of national salvation
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We feel that Chris Morris should be made prime minister as he would do a far better job than the current incumbant.
We also feel the rest of the cabinet should follow suit and immeadiately tend there resignations to be replaced with a cabinet of national salvation to be chosen by Chris Morris once he has been put in a position of power

reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
